page.title: 19AMBULANCE STATION
page.content: THE{AMBULANCE STATION}IS SITUATED IN THE{NORTH OF CHIPPENHAM},ON THE MALMESBURY ROAD. THE AMBULANCE STATION IS 12 YEARS OLD . A{NEW TRAINING CENTRE IS BEING BUILT ON THE PRESENT SITE .{EIGHTEEN PEOPLE}WORK AT THE STATION WHICH IS OPEN FOR{24 HOURS A DAY . THERE ARE 2 AMBULANCEMEN ON EVERY AMBULANCE . THERE IS ONE WOMAN AMBULANCE DRIVER . THERE ARE{208 {DIFFERENT PIECES OF EQUIPMENT}ON AN AMBULANCE . THE AMBULANCE STATION COVERS ALL OF WILTSHIRE . THE NEAREST HOSPITAL TO THE AMBULANCE STATION IS THE{CHIPPENHAM DISTRICT HOSPITAL}. THE AMBULANCE STATION HAS AN{INCUBATOR WHICH COST{Â£4,500}. THERE ARE 12 AMBULANCES AT THE STATION , INCLUDING A{BREAK DOWN TRUCK}. ONE OF THE AMBULANCES{LOWERS TO WITHIN 18 CM OFF {THE GROUND}TO ALLOW FOR EASY WHEELCHAIR ACCESS .
